titleStmt.title: The perfection of Scripture stated, and its sufficiency argued in a sermon preached at the publick commencement at Cambridge, Sunday July iv, 1697 / by George Stanhope ...
titleStmt.author: Stanhope, George, 1660-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Sare ..., and Matt. Wotton ...,

notesStmt.note: Half title: Dr. Stanhope's sermon at the commencement at Cambridge.
Running title: A sermon preach'd at the commencement at Cambridge.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
